Name: Trickstar
Description: Pitches are more likely to be tricks.

Name: Hot Stuff
Description: Bat will overheat quicker than usual.

Name: Happy Birthday
Description: Seagulls explode into confetti when hit.

Name: Splitter
Description: On hit, the ball has a chance of exploding into 3 pieces. You'll lose the directional multiplier.

Name: Lefty
Description: Bat position is on the right side of the screen instead of the left.

Name: Ultra Man
Description: Pitcher takes less time to pitch.

Name: Ghost
Description: Ball becomes less visible the closer it gets to the bottom of the screen

Name: Multiplier
Description: Not bad, actually adds multiplier to points.

Name: Stat Up Power
Description: Up the Power stat of a Bat.

Name: Stat Up Speed
Description: Up the Speed stat of a Swing.

Name: Fever Block
Description: Fever is safe for a certain amount of points. eg. If I strike, I should lost all fever points, instead I'll lose 3.

Name: Future Sight
Description: Player is able to see the path of the next pitch.

Name: Auto Snipe
Description: On Exit, the ball will automatically move towards a seagull.
